amendment.description: To increase the amount for RDT&E, Defense-Wide, to provide for joint threat warning system maritime variants, and to provide an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3471 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3471 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S7152-7160; text: CR S7153) To increase the amount for RDT&E, Defense-Wide, to provide for joint threat warning system maritime variants, and to provide an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3471 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3471 proposed by Senator Warner.
